name: BYTE-MD-LITE
description: A lite version of BYTE-MD for TalkDrove Followers

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be download automatically and send to you(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: Put A name for your bot or leave default name.

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mode In private mode, Only you'll be able to use the bot but in public mode anyone can use Byte-md

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (this is optionnal) But if you want to change the variables from Whatsapp then put the api key ( https://dashboard.heroku.com/account ) scroll down and you'll see a API key

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (this is optionnal) But if you want to change the variables from Whatsapp then put the app name

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session ID, make sure it starts with Byte;;;

OWNER_NAME.desc: Put owner name of the BOT or ignore Because this is Optional

OWNER_NUMBER.desc: Put owner number of the BOT, OWNER Can control the BOT even in Private Mode

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning command, it means that if anyone cross its limit they'll be kicked out or bot will be perform action accroding to the specified conditions

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put no else put yes
